channel.title: Make it real gameplay
channel.description: How can you make the private server be like the real game, i mean like you can speak to all the npcs and the right npc in right shops with right items. And all of the minigames Etc. Isnt there a source as simple as that where me and my friends can play like the real runescape without all of the hassle?

item.title: Make it real gameplay
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

No,

We are not the same as RuneScape, that would be copyright infringement. Download a source and you can make your own shops and talk to NPCâ€™s Etc.

Read full topic
